title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Nelson H. Hotchkiss, May 20, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss gives his brother a description of recent military action: a series of battles that saw both his tent-mate killed and General Jackson wounded.
keywords: Military Authority, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Troop Movement, Military Strategy, Slavery, African Americans, Women, American Civil War
